name: Virtual World Gate - Xuanwu
text: During the Battle Phase, if you control another "Virtual World Gate" card: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; change its battle position. During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Virtual World" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but negate its effects, then send 1 card from your hand to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Virtual World Gate - Xuanwu" once per turn. You can only activate 1 "Virtual World Gate - Xuanwu" per turn.
